short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveals the identity of Invisible Guardian (Gail) when viewing the NFT details on Opensea

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension, an accompaniment to my NFT collection "Invisible Guardian" 

https://opensea.io/collection/invisible-guardians

This extension takes the NFT image and decodes it into Gail, a character that walks around on your screen when you view the NFT details on Opensea.

The extension is active only for my collection on Opensea. No data is sent or received except the NFT image that will be decoded. Additionally, the code file is not minified. So you can check the entire code.
